divs: Sighting Detailsi was getting off the highway in front of the crossroads mall and the movie theater i dont know there names when over the trash mountain a little to the right off it was a very shiny metalic looking what at first i thought was a plane i stared closer and i saw no wings and it was not making any appernt movement i stared at it for a minute maybe by this time we were driving past the texas roadhouse i turned to my mom and said look at that i turned back around it was gone completly nothing was in the sky at all i thought i was going crazy it completly dissapred i know it was there cuz as we turned the reflection of the sun changed as if it wasnt moving the radio was off i didnt hear anything from its direction
Summary: a long very shiny disc or tube
trends: There have been 78 other sightings in Oklahoma City
There were no other sightings in Oklahoma City on or around September 28th 2009
